New in and children's reading ideas

Reviews, suggestions and lists of new books for children aged 0-11. We have recommendations for readers aged 11+ in our Young Adult section.

Christmas Dinner of Souls, by Ross Montgomery

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 14, 2017

Today's book is Christmas Dinner of Souls, by Ross Montgomery.

A Kitten Called Holly, by Helen Peters & Ellie Snowden

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 13, 2017

Today's book is A Kitten Called Holly, by Helen Peters & Ellie Snowden.

Horrid Henry's Christmas, by Francesca Simon & Tony Ross

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 12, 2017

Today's book is Horrid Henry's Christmas, by Francesca Simon & Tony Ross.

Jingle Bells!, by Tracey Corderoy & Steven Lenton

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 11, 2017

Today's book is Jingle Bells!, by Tracey Corderoy & Steven Lenton.

Nadiya's Bake Me a Festive Story: thirty festive recipes and stories for children, by Nadiya Hussain & Clair Rossiter

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 10, 2017

Today's book is Nadiya's Bake Me a Festive Story: thirty festive recipes and stories for children, by Nadiya Hussain & Clair Rossiter.

Merry Christmas, Hugless Douglas, by David Melling

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 9, 2017

Today's book is Merry Christmas, Hugless Douglas, by David Melling.

Lucy's Magical Surprise, by Anne Booth

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 8, 2017

Today's book is Lucy's Magical Surprise, by Anne Booth.

New super-readable Barrington Stoke titles for December 2017 and January 2018

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 7, 2017

Publishers Barrington Stoke, who specialise in books for children with dyslexia and visual stress, have some brilliant titles coming out over December 2017 and January 2018.

The Princess and the Christmas Rescue, by Caryl Hart & Sarah Warburton

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 7, 2017

Today's book is The Princess and the Christmas Rescue, by Caryl Hart & Sarah Warburton.

Stanley's Christmas Adventure, by Jeff Brown & Rob Biddulph

Written by Sophie Green · Published Dec 6, 2017

Today's book is Stanley's Christmas Adventure, by Jeff Brown & Rob Biddulph.
